name: Dark Machamp

attacks.name: Fling
attacks.text: Your opponent shuffles his or her Active Pokémon and all cards attached to it into his or her deck. This attack can't be used if your opponent has no Benched Pokémon.

flavorText: It is almost impossible to defend against a Machamp's four powerful arms.

strengths: Fling removes opponent's Active Pokemon entirely
Shuffles all attached energy and evolution cards
Mega Punch is efficient for early pressure
Completely denies prize card from shuffled Pokemon
weaknesses: Low HP of 70 for a Stage 2
Fling can't be used if opponent has no bench
4 energy cost for Fling is expensive

competitiveHistory: Dark Machamp's Fling attack was unique and devastating - completely removing the opponent's Active Pokemon and all attached cards from the game by shuffling them into the deck. This denied prizes and wasted the opponent's energy investment. However, the 4 energy cost, Stage 2 requirement, low HP, and restriction requiring opponent benched Pokemon limited its competitive viability. It was more of a fun card than a competitive staple.

rulings.ruling: Fling shuffles the Pokemon and all cards attached (Energy, Tools, etc.) into the opponent's deck. No prize is taken.
You cannot use Fling if your opponent has no Benched Pokemon, even if you meet the energy cost.
After Fling resolves, a Benched Pokemon becomes the new Active Pokemon.
Fling bypasses effects that prevent damage or knockouts since it doesn't deal damage.
